name: the Line - episode 1 (demo)
description: This is a roguelike dungeon crawler game about standing in a line. The line spread through depressed poisoned city district. Player can fight with people around, barter with them or use their psychological weaknesses to proceed in the line. Game includes turn-based combate system with different upgraids and unlocking attacks. This is a demo version of the first (of three) episode. We are waiting for your reports marginal.acts@gmail.com
